args.name: clientId
args.info: Client Id obtained from Mapillary

args.name: closeToLongitude
args.info: Longitude for the filter by a location that images are close to

args.name: closeToLatitude
args.info: Latitude for the filter by a location that images are close to

args.name: lookAtLongitude
args.info: Longitude for the filter by a location that images are taken in the direction of the specified point (and therefore that point is likely to be visible in the images)

args.name: lookAtLatitude
args.info: Latitude for the filter by a location that images are taken in the direction of the specified point (and therefore that point is likely to be visible in the images)

args.name: minBoundingBoxX
args.info: Minimal X for filter by the bounding box

args.name: minBoundingBoxY
args.info: Minimal Y for filter by the bounding box

args.name: maxBoundingBoxX
args.info: Maximal X for filter by the bounding box

args.name: minBoundingBoxY
args.info: Maximal Y for filter by the bounding box

args.name: radius
args.info: Filter images within the radius around the  closeTo location (default  100 meters).

args.name: userKeys
args.info: Filter images captured by users.

args.info: Filter images captured by users.
